name: [AI Tools 101] Restructuring data with Google Sheets and ChatGPT
description: Discover how to convert unstructured data into organized, structured information using Google Sheets and ChatGPT in this [AI Tools 101](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fNCy9tsp108&list=PLrED3I754LhmTtlldfGklaEMh-ZaCa3EK&index=8&ab_channel=Make) course template. Simplify your data management process and enhance accuracy with automated text-to-structure transformation.
